N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 325.2 - Requirements for the use of pesticides

State Regulations
(a) Pesticides must be used in such a manner
and under such wind and other conditions as to prevent contamination of people, pets, fish, wildlife, crops, property, structures, lands, pasturage or waters
adjacent to the area of use. (b) Pesticides are to be used only in accordance with label and labeling directions
or as modified or expanded and approved by the department. (c) All equipment containing pesticides and
drawing water from any water source shall have an effective anti-siphon device
to prevent backflow. (d) During
pesticide use, the certified applicator, certified technician or commercial
pesticide apprentice must have in their custody a copy of the label for each
pesticide being used. The certified applicator, certified technician or
commercial pesticide apprentice must make each label available for inspection
upon request of the department. Notes
